    • Method Detail

      • getSpearman

        public static double getSpearman(Ranking rankingGold,
                                 Ranking rankingSystem)
        Calculate Spearman correlation coefficient of the two ranked lists. Rankings have to have the same size (checked) and contain the same elements (not checked). Formula: \rho = {1- \frac {6 \sum d_i^2}{n(n^2 - 1)}}. where d_i is the distance btw the two ranks.
        Parameters:
        rankingGold -
        rankingSystem -
        Returns:
